content: up the drawstring ** next ** weave the drawstring side ​ without the bead in and out between stitches i go usually every 2-3 stitches on the finishing top single_crochet st row i like to go between the 2nd and 3rd row but it is your preference i then add my 2nd bead add the 2nd knot to secure it in place and cut off any extra string to keep my sides even thank you for choosing this pattern and i hope you enjoy
